name: Abstraction (The Almighty Banana)
description:
WARNING: WINDOWS DOWNLOAD HIGHLY RECOMMENDED! SOME SOUNDS ARE MISSING/DO NOT WORK ON THE WEB VERSION AND CAN MAKE THE GAME LESS FUN/HARDER!

A platformer game where the platforms are not real...

Complete the level by feeling your surroundings, rather than looking at them.

Made for Brackeys Game Jam 2022.1 in less than 2 days!

Theme: It is not real.

HOW TO PLAY:
  • Use A and D or left and right arrow to move
  • Press W, up arrow, or space to jump.
  • Press R to restart a level
  • Spikes kill you
  • Blue jump boosts launch you up
  • Orange shapes reverse your gravity
